org.phantomapi.gui

Class PhantomWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.phantomapi.gui.PhantomWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener, Window
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListViewWindow, PhantomDialog, TabbedWindow

    public class PhantomWindow
extends Object
implements Window, org.bukkit.event.Listener
    A Window implementation
    Author:
    cyberpwn
